meanings.definition: The surgical procedure of removing excess fat from specific areas of the body.
meanings.sent1: After the liposuctions, her waist looked slimmer.
meanings.sent2: She decided to undergo liposuctions to get rid of the extra fat.
meanings.sent3: The liposuctions made her feel lighter and more confident.
meanings.sent4: The liposuctions were like a sculptor shaping her body.
meanings.sent5: The results of the liposuctions were instantly noticeable.

meanings.definition: The act of performing liposuction on a patient.
meanings.sent1: The liposuctions were performed by a skilled surgeon.
meanings.sent2: The clinic specialized in offering liposuctions to clients.
meanings.sent3: During the liposuctions, the medical team worked efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The liposuctions were like a dance of precision and expertise.
meanings.sent5: The success of the liposuctions brought satisfaction to the team.

meanings.definition: The result of undergoing liposuction surgery.
meanings.sent1: Her new figure was the outcome of successful liposuctions.
meanings.sent2: The liposuctions left her feeling rejuvenated and happy.
meanings.sent3: The liposuctions transformed her body into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The liposuctions were a key to her newfound confidence.
meanings.sent5: The effects of the liposuctions were truly remarkable.
